title: Chalice Cover, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Green silk chalice cover edged with border of Milanese lace showing scrolling pattern filled with animal forms. Fond: maille carrée. Modes: portes.

mid-18th century. Medium: linen, silk
